import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NotificationService } from 'src/app/shared/notification.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homedata', templateUrl: './homedata.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homedata.component.css'] }) export class HomedataComponent implements OnInit { notification:any; constructor(public serv:NotificationService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.serv.viewmessage().subscribe((data=>{ this.notification=data; console.log(this.notification) })) } }
ICTAK Paatshala

ICT Academy of Kerala is a Social Enterprise created in a Public Private Partnership model (PPP) for imparting ICT skills to the youths of Kerala.

Go To Paatshala
Digital Workforce Management System

A Kerala Development and Innovation Strategic Council (K-DISC) initiative, Kerala Knowledge Economy Mission (KKEM)
